intro: Elatostema yosiei, commonly known as the Yosiei Elatostema, is a species of flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, commonly known as the nettle family. The plant is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of tiny, greenish-white flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors or rocky crevices. Elatostema yosiei is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
